sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		CrimeTypeName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [FileName] AS CrimeTypeName\nFROM [staging].[UNCrime_typed]',
	format: 'query') ~> source1

sources.name: source2
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimCrimeTypeKey as integer,
		CrimeTypeNameDST as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT [DimCrimeTypeKey]\n      ,[CrimeTypeName] AS CrimeTypeNameDST\nFROM [dwh].[DimCrimeType]',
	format: 'query') ~> source2

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Exists1 sink(input(
		DimCrimeTypeKey as integer,
		CrimeTypeName as string,
		sysETLrunId as integer,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysCreatedBy as integer,
		sysChangedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
Sort1, Sort2 exists(DerivedColumn1@CrimeTypeName == CrimeTypeNameDST,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
